info.name: External user authentication extended 2
info.summary: Use external user authentication methods like IMAP, SMB, FTP, WebDAV, HTTP BasicAuth, SSH and XMPP
info.description:
Use external user authentication methods to give users acces to your Nextcloud instance:
* IMAP * SMB * FTP * WebDAV * HTTP BasicAuth * SSH * XMPP
Read the [documentation](https://github.com/peter-vanpoucke/nextcloud-user_external_extd2#readme) to learn how to configure it!
info.author: Robin Appelman
